plot: Publisher Martin Jamison sends for Philo Vance as he wants to hire him as a technical advisor on the crime stories he publishes. Paul Morgan, Morgan's partner, regards the plan as foolish. ...
title: Philo Vance's Secret Mission
plot_es: Publisher Martin Jamison sends for Philo Vance as he wants to hire him as a technical advisor on the crime stories he publishes. Paul Morgan, Morgan's partner, regards the plan as foolish. ...

cast.role: Louise Roberts aka Mrs. Paul Morgan
cast.name: Toni Todd
